title: Low FPS after hard drive wipe
body:
Hello, I recently got my hard drive wiped, and now LoL has dropped its FPS significantly. I used to get from 100-150 FPS on max graphics, now I only get 50-60 and down to 20 in teamfights. This only happens on this game. I have updated to the most recent graphics driver. Also, temperature is not a problem. Are there any suggestions or drivers/software that should be downloaded?

Specs:
Windows 7 64 bit
GTX 660 ti
AMD FX-6120

Thank you.

replies.body: This is basically what happened to me but after patch 4.20. I have not seen Riot even acknowledge this problem.
